DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find best way help pregnant woman keep track baby 's movement . During pregnancy , feel baby 's movement normal . A decrease movement indicate potential problem baby 's well-being . This study see daily electronic reminder kick count chart help woman well track baby 's movement last week pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Promoting Fetal Movement Monitoring : Improving Birth Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Pregnant woman come Hoffman Associates Center Advanced Fetal Care Mercy Medical Center prenatal care delivery may join study . You must able receive daily text message cell phone access computer check daily email order take part study . It expect 80 pregnant woman take part study . The study end within month delivery baby . There evidence publish literature suggest maternal monitoring fetal movement may improve fetal mortality rate infant health . Kick count specific strategy monitor fetal movement . Kick count typically perform daily 10-minute increment specify number `` kick '' count . In general , keep track kick count begin 28th week pregnancy , early high-risk pregnancy . Keeping track kick count allow mother monitor baby 's normal activity pattern identify baby 's movement may decrease . This study conduct examine whether daily electronic reminder , send use either cell phone text message computer-based email , deliver conjunction use paper-based kick count chart , increase likelihood completion paper-based kick count chart well knowledge regard use kick count method compare paper-based kick count chart alone .
DOC.criteria: 2428 week pregnant able receive daily text message email 18 year age old willing sign inform consent unable sign inform consent
